scripts.dev: echo 'Starting development server...' && sleep 1 && echo 'Server running on http://localhost:3000' && echo 'GraphQL endpoint: http://localhost:3000/graphql' && echo 'Admin panel: https://admin.example.com'
scripts.build: echo 'Building project...' && sleep 1 && echo 'Build completed successfully!' && echo 'Preview at https://preview.vercel.app/abc123'
scripts.test: echo 'Running tests...' && echo '✓ Test 1 passed' && echo '✗ Test 2 failed' && echo 'Error: Cannot find module "./utils"' >&2 && echo '1 passing, 1 failing'
scripts.lint: echo 'Linting code...' && echo 'Warning: unused variable at line 42' && echo 'Error: Missing semicolon at line 105' >&2 && echo 'Linting completed with 1 warning and 1 error'
scripts.error-demo: echo 'Starting process...' && sleep 1 && echo 'Error: Failed to connect to database at postgresql://localhost:5432' >&2 && echo 'Fatal: Connection timeout' >&2 && exit 1
scripts.docs: echo 'Generating documentation...' && echo 'Docs available at https://docs.myproject.com' && echo 'API reference: http://localhost:8080/api-docs'
